org.apache.juneau.parser

Class ParserContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HtmlParserContext, JsonParserContext, MsgPackParserContext, RdfParserContext, UonParserContext, XmlParserContext

    public class ParserContext
extends Context
    Parent class for all parser contexts.
    Author:
    James Bognar (james.bognar@salesforce.com)

    • Field Detail

      • PARSER_debug

        public static final String PARSER_debug
        Debug mode (Boolean, default=false).

        Enables the following additional information during parsing:

        • When bean setters throws exceptions, the exception includes the object stack information in order to determine how that method was invoked.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARSER_trimStrings

        public static final String PARSER_trimStrings
        Trim parsed strings (Boolean, default=false).

        If true, string values will be trimmed of whitespace using String.trim() before being added to the POJO.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParserContext

        public ParserContext(ContextFactory cf)
        Constructor.

        Typically only called from ContextFactory.getContext(Class).

        Parameters:
        cf - The factory that created this context.
